togetherinrubimod:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
togetherinrubimod:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

togetherinrubimod:SympathyStrike.NAME: Sympathy Strike
togetherinrubimod:SympathyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If played by a class other than a Hegemon, deal !M! rubimod:Necrotic damage on hit.

${modID}:SpiritCoins.NAME: Spirit Coins
${modID}:SpiritCoins.DESCRIPTION: Give ALL allies !B!x3 Block, rubimod:Bleeding, and !togetherinrubimod:Leech! rubimod:Leech_Toxin.
${modID}:SpiritCoins.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Give ALL allies !B!x3 Block, rubimod:Bleeding, and !togetherinrubimod:Leech! rubimod:Leech_Toxin.

togetherinrubimod:UmbralArmament.NAME: Umbral Armaments
togetherinrubimod:UmbralArmament.DESCRIPTION: ALL allies apply !M! rubimod:Necrotoxin on hit this turn.

togetherinrubimod:ParentsRunaSchool.NAME: ..and Drink!
togetherinrubimod:ParentsRunaSchool.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an Insight into ALL draw piles.
togetherinrubimod:ParentsRunaSchool.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an Insight+ into ALL draw piles.

togetherinrubimod:WayoftheReaper.NAME: Way of the Reaper
togetherinrubimod:WayoftheReaper.DESCRIPTION: Add a Punish to ALL allies hands.
togetherinrubimod:WayoftheReaper.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Add a Punish+ to ALL allies hands.

togetherinrubimod:UtterContempt.NAME: Utter Contempt
togetherinrubimod:UtterContempt.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! rubimod:Sin. NL This enemy's rubimod:Sin applies to their Poison.

togetherinrubimod:SilverFeast.NAME: Silver Feast
togetherinrubimod:SilverFeast.DESCRIPTION: Cleanse all enemies of debuffs. ALL allies gain [E] and draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
togetherinrubimod:SilverFeast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cleanse all enemies of debuffs. ALL allies gain [E] and draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

togetherinrubimod:HegemonyAura.NAME: Hegemony Aura
togetherinrubimod:HegemonyAura.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an ally is attacked, apply !M! rubimod:Sin back.
togetherinrubimod:HegemonyAura.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever an ally is attacked, apply !M! rubimod:Sin back.

togetherinrubimod:KindofHisThing.NAME: Kind of His Thing
togetherinrubimod:KindofHisThing.DESCRIPTION: Gain 15 rubimod:Necrotoxin. NL. ALL players gain buffs over time.
togetherinrubimod:KindofHisThing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 15 rubimod:Necrotoxin. NL. ALL players gain buffs and lose !M! hp to draw !M! each turn.

togetherinrubimod:Moralise.NAME: Moralise
togetherinrubimod:Moralise.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply Weak to ALL.
